div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2050 San Cesario, 16 km. SE of Modena, (699) Gallia Cispadana, 1834 Burial: 208-150 B.C. (Crawford) Contents: 6 AR, 2 AE Massalia: 1 dr.; 4 ob. (all barbarous) Ariminum: 1 AE Roman Rep.: 1 vict.; 1 semis Disposition: unknown Cavedoni, BullInst 1843, p. 199 Thomsen, ERC I, p. 108 Crawford, RRCH 111
